title: CraftBukkit 1.2.5-R3.0 (2203)发布
author: sjjklh
txt_content:
本帖最后由 sjjklh 于 2012-5-26 12:42 编辑 

http://forums.bukkit.org/threads/craftbukkit-1-2-5-r3-0-is-now-available.77446/#post-1135584
A new CraftBukkit Recommended Build (1.2.5-R3.0) that provides Minecraft 1.2.5 compatibility and fixes issues in CraftBukkit 1.2.5-R2.0 is now available.
新的CraftBukkit正式版，提供对Minecraft1.2.5的兼容，而且修复了很多问题。
Will plugins break with this build? 插件会在这个版本中崩溃吗？
Provided the developers of the plugins you are using are keeping up with the development of Bukkit, all your plugins should work fine.   大意是应该不用太过担心

Notes: 注：
This Recommended Build includes an upgrade to the JLine we use in Bukkit. As a result, Windows servers need to have the Visual C++ 2008 redistributable installed and a console that supports ANSI formatting (like ANSICON) if you want to be able to see text formatting in your console (or use -nojline to disable JLine if you don't want to).
本正式版包括对JLine的更新。所以，服务器操作系统为Windows的用户必须安装C++2008运行库，而且如果您想在控制台中查看格式化的文本，控制台要支持ANSI格式（例如ANSICON，或者使用-nojline来禁用JLine。）

Known Issues:  已知问题：

None.   无。

详细更新条目：http://dl.bukkit.org/downloads/craftbukkit/view/01119_1.2.5-R3.0/

大小：
            10.7 MB (11220110 字节)

版本:

replies.txt_content: R2好像才刚出不久的样子，R3就出来了
